ja500:8.1: kammāni karoti bālo → karonti bālā (s2, s3, mr)
ja500:8.2: Idhameva → idameva (bj, s2, s3, Ma-aka) | imameva (mr), maññamāno → maññamānā (s2, s3, mr)
ja500:9.2: Na bandhuvā → na bandhavā (bj, s2, s3, mr), na sarīravaṇṇo yo → na sarīrāvakāso (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja500:13.4: iddhiṃ paññopi loke → iddhiparo hi loke (bj, s2, s3) | iddhiparo hi loko (pts1)
ja500:16.4: hi naṃ → sirihīnaṃ (bj, mr) | sirīhīnaṃ (s2, s3, pts1), na paññā → na paññaṃ (s2, s3, mr)
